msg: Small fixes to the build make the release build work.

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-1369 Modified to test active thread count in the ThreadPoolTaskExecutor during cleanup. If active count = 0 dont call awaitTermination(). Calling awaitTermination() after all threads in the thread pool exit their run() methods causes a hang.

msg: Try to determine constraint name when dropping tables.
